title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 107.6 - Dealers without prepaid registrations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 107.6 - Dealers without prepaid registrations

State Regulations

Unless a prepaid registration has been issued under the
preceding section, a dealer must, prior to delivery, obtain a registration for
a snowmobile that dealer sells unless the purchaser signs a declaration of
exemption from registration, as described in section
107.9
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
107.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
